General.Name: Element Global Inc
General.Description: Element Global, Inc. operates in mining, renewable energy, technology, sports, media, and finance businesses. The company was formerly known as Global Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Element Global, Inc. in July 2015. Element Global, Inc. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 6555 Barton Avenue, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90038
